mapper.select: SELECT ps_num, si_image, st_name, pi_image, p_name, p_price, TO_CHAR(ps_expiration ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') AS ps_expiration, ps_count, ps_price FROM customer c INNER JOIN favstore fs ON c.c_num = fs.c_num INNER JOIN store st ON fs.st_num = st.st_num INNER JOIN productsell ps ON st.s_num = ps.s_num INNER JOIN product p ON ps.p_num = p.p_num INNER JOIN proimage pi ON p.pi_num = pi.pi_num INNER JOIN storeimage si ON st.si_division = si.si_division WHERE c_id = #{c_id} AND ps_state = 0 ORDER BY st_name
